title: Cannot sync a .java file and another resource
description: When attempting to sync a .java file and another resource, the Team entry is missing from the context menu.
OB: When opening the context menu, the Team entry is not present.
EB: The Team entry should be displayed in the context menu.
SR: To reproduce this issue: 1. Open the package viewer and select a .java file and another resource (e.g., a .properties file). 2. Observe that the Team entry is not shown in the context menu.
